question: Can I give Qurbani? My parents did not give any Haqeeqaa for me in my childhood...
answer:
QUESTION
I am 55 years old. My parents did not give any Haqeeqaa for me in my childhood. Alhamdulillah now I am in a good position. Can I give Qurbani in my name for Eid-Ul-Adha even though I wouldn't have given Haqeeqaa. If not, what is the solution?
ANSWER


Share:
You can slaughter an animal for Qurbaani even though you have not done Aqeeqah. You may slaughter an animal for Aqeeqah at anytime in your life.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
